title: Overall
stimulusHtml:
3 points

One point is earned for a correct definition of the concept of supranational organization.

An acceptable definition is:

An organization that has national governments as members with its own sovereign powers over member states.

Note: These powers may be specific to policy areas. Students may use the terms country, state, or nation-state in their response.

One point EACH (2 points total) is earned for correctly identifying a supranational organization and a country that is a member of the organization. 

Acceptable identifications include:

  • Nigeria — The Economic Community of West African States (ECOWAS)

  • Great Britain — World Trade Organization (WTO) and the European Union (EU)

  • Russia — WTO

  • China — WTO

  • Mexico — WTO

A score of zero (0) is earned for an off-task answer or an attempted answer that merits no points.

A score of dash (—) is earned for a blank answer.
